string.text: Pripyat Mutant Purge
{npc_name} has commanded you to do away with the mutants threatening Pripyat.
My brother, never forget that it is we who control Pripyat, not the mutants. As we speak there are some in the area that threaten our presence. Go and destroy them.
You have succeeded. Well done.
Eradicate the Pestilence
The wise {npc_name} has placed you in charge of a band of Monolith warriors to eliminate a camp of %s.
We can no longer tolerate this scourge of unindoctrinated %s. Lead your brothers into the Zone and clear the pestilence from where they sleep.
Excellent work. You serve the Monolith well.
Hunt for Food
Lead a hunt into the Zone to harvest meat for your Monolith brothers.
My son, we must replenish our food stores. Will you lead a hunt so your brothers may feast?
You have served the Monolith well. The meat you have brought will be prepared for tonight's feast. As a reward, we will reserve the eyeballs for you.
Search Agroprom Underground
Holy documents have been stolen and hidden in the tunnels beneath Agroprom. Search the underground complex and recover the great works.

My brother, I have an important assignment for you. A book containing the great works of our masters has been stolen. This atrocious act of heresy must be dealt with swiftly. Your brothers have tracked the infidel to Agroprom, and suspect he has hidden the documents in the underground tunnels located there. Go there and find our master's stolen property. Bring the scriptures back to us so we may once again bask in their glory.

You have done well, my brother. This book contains all the wonders that our lords and masters have achieved before they ascended. We are the protectors of the miraculous devices they created, and the caretakers of the hallowed grounds on which they were concieved. You are truely blessed to have gazed upon this text directly, not many Monolith have had such an honor.
Exterminate the Infidel Vermin
Meet with the Monolith warriors that have sighted the group of infidel %s.
Exterminate the vile %s for the good of the almighty Monolith.

The infidel pestilence continues to plague our great works. Your brothers have located a group of them and have them cornered like the rats they are. Go to them and lead them in the eradication of the vermin.
Our brother %s has arrived to help us. Monolith be praised.
You have done well. You are a loyal servant of the Monolith.
Destroy the Non-Believers
Lead the Monolith attack against the infidels.
The time has come, my son. You must lead your brothers into battle. Fight fiecely and accept no surrender. Defeat the infidels for the good of the Monolith.
Excellent work. You are a fine warrior.
Venture into the Zone
You must prove your worth by surviving a journey into the Zone.

My son, you must prove yourself to the almighty Monolith. You must travel alone deep into the Zone. Face all challenges that confront you. Destroy all enemies you encounter. Do this for the good of the Monolith.
You have done well, my son.
Recover Stolen Monolith Equipment
A stalker has sabotaged the Brain Scorcher. Recover the equipment he removed.
An infidel has stolen a vital piece of equipment from the Brain Scorcher. You must recover it for the good of the almighty Monolith.
You have done well.
Bring %s to Monolith Member
{npc_name} is ill and requires %s.
None
My brother, I am very ill. Cleric has graciously offered to pray for me but I'm pretty sure I just need %s. Please bring me some.
Thank you my brother. May the glory of the Monolith shine upon you.
Redemption
A Monolith brother was defeated by an infidel. Destroy him lest anyone begin to think the Monolith are not to be feared.

My brother, Krolik has asked of me that I slay one of the infidels for the good of the Monolith. I fear I have failed him, as I was not able to get to the target. Will you not complete my task and redeem my failure?
You have done well. It is an honor to serve the almighty Monolith along side with you.
Eliminate Dangerous Mutants for Monolith
Eliminate dangerous mutants in the area for the Monolith.
There are dangerous mutants in the area. They have killed one of our brothers. Go eliminate them.
You have done well, my brother.
%s for a Monolith
{npc_name} is in desperate need of a %s and is willing to give you everything he owns for one.
None

My brother, the great Krolik has tasked me with an assignment that will require a %s, but I do not have the money or resources to get one. I do not want to fail him. If you can find what I need, I will give to you my only worldly possession, a %s.
Thank you, brother. This is exactly what I need.
Monolith Guide
{npc_name} is lost and has requested your assistance guiding him to his destination.
My brother, I am lost. Will you escort me to %s and help me find my way?
This is my destination. Come see me, I will reward you for your assistance.
Thank you brother. Monolith be praised.
Recover Stolen Data
Infidels have captured information about the glorious great works. Search the battlefield where they were killed and find the device they used to record the stolen data.

The infidel vermin have been caught spying on our great works. We slaughtered the pestilence but were unable to locate the device they recorded the data on. Go look there, find the device for the good of the Monolith.
You have done well, my brother. We must not allow the eyes of the unclean to gaze upon our glorious works.
